location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Bebington [Babington], Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Bebington [Babington], Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting, for the purpose of being forwarded to Persia, a letter sent on 14 March from Sir Evan Nepean, Governor of Bombay, to Mahomed Hoosain Khan Nizam ood doulah [Muhammad Husain Khan Nizam ud-Daula], Prime Minister to His Majesty the King of Persia.
